text.section:
The prospectus shall contain:
the material information set forth in the application for registration, as required by regulation of the Commissioner; and
any other disclosures that the Commissioner requires.
The prospectus shall state, in 10-point or larger bold type, that registration is not approval, recommendation, or endorsement by the Commissioner.
If the applicant is a subfranchisor, the application shall include the same information about the subfranchisor as is required from the franchisor under this section.

The Commissioner by regulation may:
set the form and content of financial statements required under this subtitle;
state the circumstances under which consolidated financial statements may be submitted; and
state the circumstances under which financial statements shall be audited by an independent certified public accountant or other public accountant.
